snippet: HIRMES-- Menachem Yisrael. The Yeshiva University family is saddened by the passing of our alumnus of the Marsha Stern Yeshiva University High School for Boys and Yeshiva College, a highly respected computer expert who lived in Teaneck, NJ and Sarasota, Florida. Heartfelt condolences are extended to his beloved wife, Helene Hirmes and their children David Hirmes and Adina Levitt, as well as to his adoring sister Hannah Storch and cherished brother, Eleazar (and Greta) Hirmes, a YU Honorary degree recipient, and YU Guardians. May the entire family find comfort among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Richard M. Joel, President, Yeshiva University Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HIRMES, MENACHEM YISRAEL
